item.title: Chinese property giant Evergrande delisted after spectacular fall
item.description: The embattled property giant's shares were taken off the Hong Kong stock market on Monday.

item.title: France summons US envoy over antisemitism claims
item.description: France denies allegations it is failing to tackle a surge in antisemitism since the Gaza war began.

item.title: What is behind the passion of Love Island USA's Nigerian fanbase?
item.description: Nigerians made their mark during this year's Love Island USA - but it caused tensions within the fanbase.

item.title: How Russia is quietly trying to win over the world beyond the West
item.description: Over the past three years, Russian state-backed news channel RT has expanded its international presence.

item.title: A cut-off finger ended her comfortable family life. Now she's hiding from US officials
item.description: Donald Trump declared some cartels to be terrorist organisations. So why are the victims of cartels in hiding?
